Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 8.1.2

==Policy Statement==

Protect user management functions.

==Policy Purpose==

Protect user management functions to prevent unauthorized changes to access privileges.

==Related Guidance==

* [[c4baaf97-8f95-41d7-817d-c1989e4ec0ae|Protect Account Management Functions]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[2bc9593d-0510-49c8-ba25-1280823ae824|Account Management Functions Are Protected]]
